0: When I booked it I was certain it stated the rooms had been renovated but they are looking worn and do not look as good in person as they do in pictures
Wish the lobby was more updated and attractive
Rooms need a facelift especially bathrooms
I called the front desk and they said they would have maintenance come right away but they never did
The place could use an update
Needs new paint beverage machines not working lounge chairs dirty general maintenance
Rooms are pretty good seem dated and in need of a refurb particularly considering the room price
We only noticed a sewer type of smell in the morning while we were having breakfast at Cava they were doing some reno not sure if related
Look forward to the updated hotel
After the full renovation that is progress it will be a five star review
1: Beautiful renovated room with view to golf course
Our room was newly renovated and was very clean
Rooms were newly remodeled with a modern twist
After its redesign this place is amazing
The rooms have been renovated excellent view of the golf course mountains
The property has just been remodeled and the rooms are large and very well done

But a beautiful hotel does not necessarily make for a great stay but this hotel exudes friendliness the employees go out of their way to help you out the staff from the maintenance crews to housekeeping to wait staff to management
We ended up choosing Renaissance because of the variety of things to do with a toddler and because of the new renovation we love the muted pinks and blue greens with the pop of teal and black
Rooms were just all renovated and they look awesome
